item.description:
And we mean real Mexican this time!

Join us at Rancho Viejo in Granby for some traditional, and not quite so American-ized as usual, Mexican Food. In addition to the expected quesadillas, burritos, fajitas, and enchiladas, they offer some excellent chicken, pork, beef and seafood dishes, along with several selections for the vegetarians. And the margaritas aren't half bad either!

The restaurant is in the Geissler's Plaza on Bank Street in the center of Granby, just off from Route 20.
item.name: Ethnic dining goes Mexican
